backend/config/database.ts.description: PostgreSQL is already configured as primary database client with connection pooling (min:2, max:10). SQLite config is commented out. Database connects to PostgreSQL on port 5433.

backend/src/api/.description: Strapi has 7 content types: agent, skill, mcp-server, mcp-tool, task, chat-session, chat-message. All use component-based architecture with relations.

docs/database/BACKUP_PROCEDURES.md.description: Comprehensive PostgreSQL backup procedures documentation covering manual backups (pg_dump), automated script usage, Docker backup methods, cron scheduling, retention policies (7 backups default, GFS strategy), backup types (full, incremental WAL, logical vs physical), best practices (3-2-1 rule, encryption, monitoring), and troubleshooting. 600+ lines with production-ready examples for cron, docker-compose, and Kubernetes.
